desc: projectLive is a tool for people to easily setup their own personale streaming server. Each instance will be able to issue streaming keys to use for authentication on the rmtp server.

The project is composed of three parts: 
:small_orange_diamond: The server, handling the stream conversion. 
:small_orange_diamond: The streaming frontend, where users will be able to watch the stream and interact ina chat window. 
:small_orange_diamond: The admin dashboard, where the streamer will be able to set the stream title and see all the stream stats (number of viewers etc.)

tasks.title: Notion.so Tasks
tasks.desc: We will be using [Notion.so](https://notion.so) to manage the tasks within this project, To gain access to the project board, check the pinned messages in this channel for more information!

welcomeMsg: Please take a moment to read through the pinned messages. Here you will find important notes and how to get stated with the project!
